attributes.action: uphold his promise to consult by way of referendum on any and all changes which may lead to shift of power towards the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair promised a referundum. 
Ceding more power to Europe is not what
the majority of the electorate want.
Any change to any portion of EU legislation without electorial support via majority vote is undemocratic and underhand. Mr Blair we, your paymasters demand that all sections of the Eu  past, present and current treaties
be subject to democratic vote

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/eumembership/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
